identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Midnight Fintech' experience that feels like a hedge fund control room, not a generic SaaS dashboard.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, card headers, and major metric displays. Tracking-tight is mandatory for sizes above 24px.

body.usage: Use for all standard text, labels, and descriptions. Excellent legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: MANDATORY for all financial data, tickers, percentages, and tables. Ensures tabular alignment.

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers, floating filters, and modal overlays.

borders.usage: Use 1px borders with low opacity to define structure without clutter.

shadows.usage: Soft, diffuse shadows to lift active elements.

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 p-4 md:p-6

landing.name: The Tetris
landing.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 p-8 md:p-12

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 text-white rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-slate-200 border border-slate-700 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all

cards.base: bg-slate-900/50 border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-blue-500/30 transition-colors duration-300
cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden bg-slate-900/50 border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:bg-slate-800/50 transition-all cursor-pointer

inputs.base: bg-slate-950 border border-slate-800 rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-slate-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-slate-600

sliders.custom: Use Shadcn Slider but override the thumb to be a glowing 'orb' (h-4 w-4 bg-blue-500 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(59,130,246,0.8)]) and the track to be thin (h-1 bg-slate-800).

hero_background.description: Modern city skyline at blue hour, conveying stability and scale.

abstract_data.description: Abstract blue grid texture, perfect for feature backgrounds or card overlays.

team_meeting.description: Diverse professional team, use for 'About' or 'Advisors' section.

media.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'recharts' for data visualization.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1) against the dark background. Use lighter grays (Slate-300/400) for secondary text, never dark gray.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-blue-500) are mandatory for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Implement the 'Midnight Fintech' color palette in 'tailwind.config.js' immediately. Do not use default Shadcn colors.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Fund Explorer' using the 'Control Room' grid. It must feel dense but organized.
4. INTERACTION: The 'Weight Sliders' are the core feature. They must feel instant. Use React state for immediate score updates, debounce the API call if needed.
5. CHARTS: Style Recharts to match the dark theme. Remove grid lines or make them very subtle (opacity 0.05). Use custom Tooltips.
6. AUTH: Design the Login page with the 'hero_background' image on one side and a clean, glassmorphism form on the other.
7. ADMIN: The Admin panel should look distinct - perhaps more 'utilitarian' (less glass, more solid borders) to signify control.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text (it kills readability).
Avoid 'AI slop' - generic, centered, low-contrast designs.
